name: Shattered Reality
description:
Fast paced, mind bending shooter built to pump up your adrenaline as you fly around the map at mach 3. Built upon the principles that getting around is half the fun, with the added complexity of new movement tech, prepare for your reality to be shattered.

As for how you'll be getting around, classical movement tech like
  • sliding
  • wall running
  • air strafing
  • b-hopping
  • grappling
  • portals
will all be there, along with some new ideas we've come up with, like dimensional shifting, (switching between two maps that coexist in the same space,) will allow you, the player, decide where you want to go
